p: Oxidative stress is a negative effect of free radicals in the body and is considered to be an important factor leading to aging and disease. Paraquat is a strong oxidant commonly used in oxidative stress experiments. After paraquat enters the C. elegans, a series of biochemical reactions produce superoxide anions that are harmful to the cells, and the superoxide anions are further converted into active oxygen clusters such as hydrogen peroxide and hydroxyl radicals [ 24].
